sections.title: Individual Package
sections.subtitle: Experience a Personalized & Fulfilling Pilgrimage Journey
sections.description: At Alzahra Hajj and Umrah, part of the Alzahra Group, we understand the importance of a deeply personal and spiritually enriching pilgrimage. Our Individual Package is thoughtfully crafted to cater to those seeking a private and flexible journey to Makkah and Madinah, with all essential services included for your comfort and peace of mind.
sections.highlight: What’s Included in Our Individual Package..?

services.title: Visa Processing
services.description: We handle all the necessary visa arrangements, ensuring a smooth and hassle-free entry process.

services.title: Round-Trip Airfare
services.description: Seamless travel with round-trip flights—focus solely on your spiritual journey.

services.title: Airport Pickup & Drop-Off
services.description: Arrive and depart with ease through our reliable airport transfers.

services.title: Dedicated Scholarly Guide
services.description: Gain insights and guidance from an experienced scholar throughout your journey.

services.title: Visits to Historical and Sacred Sites
services.description: Explore historic landmarks in Makkah and Madinah with our insightful guided visits.
